Promotion.name: Promotion
Promotion.description: Represents a promotion associated with the loyalty program. It captures the information such as type of the promotion, issue of a voucher or credit points, promotion enrollment, and status of the promotion.

BusinessUnitId.description: ID of the internal organization unit that contains the details of the Marketing Cloud business unit associated with the promotion.

CampaignId.description: The campaign associated with the promotion.

CumulativeUsageTarget.description: The number of times a member must participate or the amount of money spent to qualify for a reward.

CurrentLiabilityAmount.description: The liability amount incurred for the promotion until now. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

CurrentPointCount.description: The liability amount incurred for the promotion until now. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

DefaultVoucherDefinitionId.description: The voucher associated with the promotion.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later where Unified Promotions is enabled.

EnrollmentEndDate.description: The last date to enroll in the promotion.

EnrollmentStartDate.description: The first date to enroll in the promotion.

FulfillmentAction.description: Select how a loyalty member is rewarded for fulfilling promotion requirements.

GameDefinitionId.description: ID of the game definition associated with the promotion.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the promotion image. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the promotion is active. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

IsCloned.description: Indicates whether the promotion has been created by cloning an existing promotion. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

IsEnrollmentRequired.description: Indicates whether enrollment is required to participate in the promotion.

IsPointsWithFactor.description: Indicates whether the promotion is applied by multiplying points with a factor or by using the fixed value in the TotalRewardPoints field. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

IsQuickPromotion.description: Indicates whether the records represent a quick promotion (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IssuedVoucherCount.description: The number of vouchers issued for the promotion until current date. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: The loyalty program currency associated with the promotion.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program associated with the promotion.

MaximumLiabilityAmount.description: The maximum liability amount that can be incurred for the promotion.

MaximumRewardValue.description: The total value that can be accumulated for the promotion.

MaximumVoucherCount.description: The maximum number of vouchers that can be issued for the promotion. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Objective.description: Business objective of the promotion. For example, launching a new product, keeping customers satisfied, or clearing stock.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PointFactor.description: The factor with which points are multiplied or divided when IsPointsWithFactor is set to true. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

PriorityNumber.description: The priority number of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later, where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

ProductCatalogId.description: ID of the product catalog associated with the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later, where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

PromotionCode.description: The unique code of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later, where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

PromotionConfiguration.description: The configuration of a quick promotion. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

RelatedPromotionId.description: ID of the promotion that was cloned to create the promotion.

RuleLibraryId.description: ID of the promotion that was cloned to create the promotion. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

StartDate.description: Required. The start date of the promotion.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

TotalRewardPoints.description: The points awarded on availing the promotion.

TransactionJournalType.description: The journal type that has been applied for the promotion. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.
